channel.title: CVE Feed for Epsiloncool -- WP Fast Total Search
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Epsiloncool -- WP Fast Total Search

item.title: CVE-2024-29799|2024-03-27T12:22:17.930Z -- Epsiloncool -- WP Fast Total Search
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Epsiloncool WP Fast Total Search allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Fast Total Search: from n/a through 1.59.211.
